## PackageManagerFeatureSet class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Reports the known features of a package manager as detected from its version number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PackageManagerFeatureSet 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [packageManager](./rush-lib.packagemanagerfeatureset.packagemanager.md) |  | <code>PackageManager</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The package manager. |
|  [shrinkwrapFilename](./rush-lib.packagemanagerfeatureset.shrinkwrapfilename.md) |  | <code>string</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The filename of the shrinkwrap file that is used by the package manager. |
|  [supportsPnpmResolutionStrategy](./rush-lib.packagemanagerfeatureset.supportspnpmresolutionstrategy.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> PNPM only. True if <code>--resolution-strategy</code> is supported. |
|  [version](./rush-lib.packagemanagerfeatureset.version.md) |  | <code>string</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The SemVer version of the package manager. |
